TopicTitle: Paige gives tutorial for tracking station in VAB a few minutes after exiting tracking station

Articles.Content:
• KSP Version: 0.1.0.0.20892
  • OS: Windows 11 (22H2)
  • CPU: AMD R9 5900X
  • GPU: EVGA RTX 3080TI
  • RAM: 32GB DDR4
  • Description of bug
    • Entered VAB after entering tracking station following a vehicle recovery and received a late Paige tutorial on the tracking station after a few minutes.
    • Expected Behavior
      • No tutorial at all OR one pertaining to vehicle building.
    • Observed Behavior
      • Received a late tracking station tutorial a few minutes after leaving tracking station and entering VAB through the pause menu.
    • Steps to Replicate
      • Unsure
  • Fixes / Workarounds: N/A
  • Mods: None
  • Other Notes: N/A
